shortDescription: Prysm mainnet ETH2.0 Beacon chain + validator
description:
Validate with Prysm: a Go implementation of the Ethereum 2.0 Serenity protocol and open source project created by Prysmatic Labs.

It includes a Grafana dashboard for the [DMS](http://my.dappnode/#/installer/dms.dnp.dappnode.eth) thanks to the amazing work of [metanull-operator](https://github.com/metanull-operator/eth2-grafana)
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)

warnings.onRemove: Make sure your StakersUI does not have this client selected! Double check in the Stakers Tab in the left NavBar
